conclusion: Determine the refractive index of the transparent object for the given monochromatic light.
The diagram shows a semi-cylindrical transparent object.
A thin bundle of monochromatic light enters along the axis OA from the left.
The light bundle is moved to point C at a distance of \(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}R\) from O.
No more light rays are emitted from the right side of the transparent object.
The light bundle enters the semi-cylindrical object along the axis OA.
The light bundle is refracted at the interface between the semi-cylindrical object and the surrounding medium.
